snippet.title: Looty Dungeon 2.0 - Experience, Levels, Scores and More!
snippet.description:
Looty Dungeon 2.0! Oh my!

Heroes can now earn experience and level up, unlocking improved abilities and different costumes!

5 brand new heroes are added in this update, and if you haven't played in a while there's a total of 15 new heroes since launch!

The prize machine has been drastically improved: earning duplicate heroes will now reward a huge amount of experience for that hero. Can you max all of their levels?

A new scoring system has been introduced, awarding scores based on accomplishments in a run. There is also a new leaderboard for your Looty Score, the combined score of all of your hero highscores.

Exciting stuff!
